name: scrap of paper
result: You open the envelope to find a torn corner of a scrap of paper. It's hard to make out what it is as it looks burned.

name: piece of string
result: You pick up the soggy piece of string. It looks like baker's twine, but you can't tell for sure.

name: cannoli
result: You break the cannoli in half, ready to take a bite. Surprisingly, you find a small brass key stuck in the filling. It looks like it might fit a lock.

name: newspaper clipping
result: This clipping shows a picture of a domed building. There seems to be something on top of it.

name: mirror
result: The mirror is just a mirror. Clara looks into it and sees herself. Could this be a clue?
